title: Reedhoy aami thomai dhilam
content:
1 - Reedhoy aami thomai dhilam

Reedhoy aami thomai dhilam
Thomar upoar beeshah
Chaari dheekay shob doobey jaye
Thaarai aamor beeshash

Preethi beethey cholabori Khotin thoma bina
Haariye jai bhare bhare thai khoree eiyee prarthona
Eiyee khudhro dhuti thumi haath dhorae
Jano chalo shara jeebon

Tomathi poi aami cheerosh thai aasha
Felae ae she chai thomar kachae aami neerasha
Probhu dhekho aamar reedhoy majhe
Aar dheo porosh tomar

title: Ke shukher ashwash Jishu amar
content:
2 - Ke shukher ashwash Jishu amar

Ke shukher ashwash Jishu amar
Aa ki gourab ashar chamatkar
Ansidar traner krita tahar
Atmate jato rakte parishkar
Aaee moar kahini aae amar gaan
Saradin kori taar stuthi gaan
Aaee moar kahini aae amar gaan
Saradin kori taar stuthi gaan

Purna samarpan purna ulash
Swargiya darshan chokher bikash
Urdhadham hoite aane dutgan
Karuna dhwani premer gunjan

Purna paritran purna bishram
Prabhu te lipta saubhagyaban
Jagi pratikhyae urdha takai
Tar purne purna premar harai

title: Paap bojha muktho nao bashona ki
content:
3 - Paap bojha muktho nao bashona ki

Paap bojha muktho nao bashona ki
Shey bol shonithe bol shonithe
Moudo pore joyi hao icha ki
Shey shonithe opurbo bol
Aachite bol bol odbhuith karigo bol
Shonithe shonithe
Aachite bol bol odbhuith karigo bol
Shonithe bol shonithe

Ichba ki thushar kiothe shado kao
Shey bol shonithe bol shonithe
Prandai shonithe shob paper dag dhao
Shey sonithe aschonjo bol
